alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 2:05PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera
